duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, develop, and be responsible for operational policies, programs, procedures, marketing activities, and management reporting concerning marina, restaurant, and sailing club operations.
Coordinate the development of long range and annual business plans for marina and restaurant operations.
Establish a basic personnel policy and monitor policies relating to personnel actions and training programs.
Prepare annual budgets, analyze financial statements, manage cash flow, and establish controls to safeguard funds.
Control and analyze the level of sales, costs, quality, and presentation of food and beverage products and service standards.
Develop a strategic marketing plan for the lease of marina berths and other marine-related business.
Compile regular reports on berthing issues and revenues along with recommendations for changes in rate structures.
Work with subordinate department heads to schedule, supervise, and direct the work of all employees. Responsible for hiring, counseling, training, and supervision of daily assignments.
Identify system dysfunctions and work to resolve dysfunctions in a timely fashion.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Hospitality Management, or related field (MBA preferred)
